name: Andoran Skye XD Demo
detailed_description:
Andoran Skye 1.5 is the huge new update of the original Andoran Skye released back in 2013. Dive into the world of Andoran once again with an all new 2.5D art style. Your goal is to tame the entity that harbors itself within the center of the planet. These powerful entities, only to be tamed by Staff Wielders, are known as Skyes.

As you explore the world, you will face many obstacles leading up to the ultimate challenge: Racing a vicious tyrant in his goal to steal control of the Skye before you do. Forget what you know about turn-based RPG. Andoran Skye 1.5 focuses on real time battles so you can stay in control 100% of the time. Whether you are using Chain Techniques to cut an enemy off or deflecting attacks, expect to be kept on your toes.

As you explore the world, you will face many obstacles leading up to the ultimate challenge: Racing a vicious tyrant in his goal to steal control of the Skye before you do. Forget what you know about turn-based RPG. Andoran Skye 1.5 focuses on real time battles so you can stay in control 100% of the time. short_description: Andoran Skye 1.5 is the huge new update of the original Andoran Skye released back in 2013. Take on the role of the Staff Wielder and tame your SKYE in this intense fantasy RPG game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processeur : 2.0 GHz or better
  • Mémoire vive : 4 MB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : GeForce 740 GTX or better
  • DirectX : Version 9.0
  • Espace disque : 1 GB d'espace disque disponible
  • Carte son : Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommandée :
  • Système d'exploitation : Windows 10
  • Mémoire vive : 8 GB de mémoire
  • Graphiques : GeForce 740 GTX or better
  • DirectX : Version 11
  • Espace disque : 1 GB d'espace disque disponible
  • Carte son : Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimale :
  • Système d'exploitation : Mountain Lion 10.8.5 or later
  • Processeur : 2.0 GHz or better
  • Mémoire vive : 256 MB de mémoire
  • Espace disque : 1 GB d'espace disque disponible
  • Carte son : Any
